mapper.select: SELECT pollutecode, polluteName, polluteClass, SYSTEMTYPE AS ST FROM T_DIC_STDPOLLCODE a LEFT JOIN T_DIC_SYSTYPE_POLLCODE_REL b ON a.CODECLASS = b.CODECLASS WHERE POLLUTECLASS IN ( 'PolluteClass12' )
SELECT SYSTEMTYPE AS ST, TNAMERT AS tableNameRT, TNAMEMI AS tableNameMin, TNAMEHH AS tableNameHH, TNAMEDD AS tableNameDD, TNAMESTAT AS tableNameMY FROM T_DIC_POINTSYSTYPE
